LABEL: 0x99
STRING: I hear the sough of the wind.

LABEL: 0xD3
STRING: Grass sways in the gentle breeze, carrying the smell of the flowers.

LABEL: 0x118
STRING: Under the starry sky,

LABEL: 0x147
STRING: in the center of a beautiful garden, I... We lay about in a circle.

LABEL: 0x1AF
STRING: With the girls who were never supposed to meet.

LABEL: 0x247
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x257
STRING: Well then, let's get started!

LABEL: 0x315
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0x325
STRING: Kyahaha. Mihomi was looking forward to talking with the girls!

LABEL: 0x3FF
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x40F
STRING: Yes. I wonder if you can tell your stories to a grown woman like me.

LABEL: 0x4E1
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x4F1
STRING: Um... I don't have anything interesting to say.

LABEL: 0x5C5
STRING: Nenene

LABEL: 0x5D5
STRING: Ufufu, how are you all doing? There's plenty of time; we should talk to our heart's content.

LABEL: 0x6DB
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0x6EB
STRING: Older Sister Nenene, you're so classy. You're like an adult! Mihomi wants to be like that too.

LABEL: 0x7DF
STRING: Nenene

LABEL: 0x7EF
STRING: It's okay, Mihomi. You will acquire calmness naturally someday.

LABEL: 0x8D7
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0x8E7
STRING: I wonder... Mihomi can't imagine becoming an adult. No matter how much time passes, people still tell me I'm childish.

LABEL: 0x9F3
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0xA03
STRING: That's because you're not conscious of your age. If you were, it's easy to imagine it.

LABEL: 0xAC6
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0xAD6
STRING: Mihomi, you don't want to be called childish by little girls, do you? If you learn it now, it will come in handy later.

LABEL: 0xBDA
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0xBEA
STRING: Hmm, fine. I'll imitate Big Sister Ayume instead. Hmph! What do you think? Mihomi looks like an adult?

LABEL: 0xCF0
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0xD00
STRING: Ha...puhahaha! You really seem to be overreaching yourself, Mihomi. Right, Moeko?

LABEL: 0xDEA
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xDFA
STRING: Yeah, yeah... ahaha...

LABEL: 0xEAE
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0xEBE
STRING: Come to think of it, Moeko, there was something I wanted to ask you. Are you really a Savior?

LABEL: 0xFB4
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0xFC4
STRING: Well... yeah... but it might not matter to everyone else. That's just how things were back in my world.

LABEL: 0x10E4
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0x10F4
STRING: What does a Savior do? Is it some kind of job?

LABEL: 0x11C2
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x11D2
STRING: They save the world. They oppose the evil of the invisible 'something'.

LABEL: 0x127B
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x128B
STRING: In other words, I'm something of a magical girl. As a Savior, my name is Clara Moemori.

LABEL: 0x1356
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x1366
STRING: Or... maybe it's the other way around.

LABEL: 0x1428
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1438
STRING: ...I don't understand. Moeko, did you actually save the world, then?

LABEL: 0x1514
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x1524
STRING: Of course I did. I am here because the world was saved. I no longer have a mission. Now, I am the same as everyone else.

LABEL: 0x15FD
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x160D
STRING: Finally... I feel like I can appreciate myself a little.

LABEL: 0x16DF
STRING: Nenene

LABEL: 0x16EF
STRING: Oh my, you've accomplished such a great feat! That's amazing...!

LABEL: 0x17CB
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x17DB
STRING: No, please, I'm not like you, Clara, just a regular working person!

LABEL: 0x189C
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x18AC
STRING: Mmm! Don't just talk about me, I want to listen to everyone else's stories too! Uh, Ayume!

LABEL: 0x19A4
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0x19B4
STRING: Mihomi wants to hear too! Big Sister Ayume, you used to be an actress, right? Why did you become an actress?

LABEL: 0x1AB6
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1AC6
STRING: Me? Well it's nothing special. I didn't have to be an actress.

LABEL: 0x1B83
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1B93
STRING: I was an ordinary person with no talent. However, I had no intention to give up, so I worked hard. And somehow I became an actress.

LABEL: 0x1C7C
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1C8C
STRING: Normal life is boring, isn't it? That's why I worked hard to take control of my life.

LABEL: 0x1D4D
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1D5D
STRING: A life where you can be somebody's special someone.

LABEL: 0x1E27
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x1E37
STRING: Oh... That's way cooler than I thought... So this is what a driven adult is like...

LABEL: 0x1F25
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x1F35
STRING: I'm the oldest here. We lived in different times, Matsuri.

LABEL: 0x2011
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0x2021
STRING: Big Sister Ayume is so cool!

LABEL: 0x20DB
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x20EB
STRING: Thank you, Mihomi. Well, that is enough about me. Nenene, I want to hear about you.

LABEL: 0x21F3
STRING: Nenene

LABEL: 0x2203
STRING: Is it my turn? I lived a life tied to my house.

LABEL: 0x22B4
STRING: Nenene

LABEL: 0x22C4
STRING: I was going to be married. It was called a political marriage. I couldn't choose my husband.

LABEL: 0x2399
STRING: Nenene

LABEL: 0x23A9
STRING: But I told myself I shouldn't show my feelings...

LABEL: 0x2462
STRING: Nenene

LABEL: 0x2472
STRING: In the end, I guess I wanted someone to rescue me.

LABEL: 0x2521
STRING: Nenene

LABEL: 0x2531
STRING: What I was looking for was right by my side, and all that was left was for me to accept it.

LABEL: 0x25FA
STRING: Nenene

LABEL: 0x260A
STRING: Apparently I'm harder to handle than I thought, haha.

LABEL: 0x26E4
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0x26F4
STRING: Older Sister Nenene...

LABEL: 0x2777
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0x2787
STRING: You know, Mihomi is the same. Mihomi wanted to be wanted by someone.

LABEL: 0x2846
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0x2856
STRING: Every day, I wanted to vanish, forever and ever. I thought no one wanted me. I thought my life had no meaning.

LABEL: 0x293D
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0x294D
STRING: However! Mihomi was able to win the heart of a person she loved in the end.

LABEL: 0x2A12
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0x2A22
STRING: That's all. Mihomi was rewarded. She was needed.

LABEL: 0x2ACF
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0x2ADF
STRING: Older Sister Nenene, aren't we the same?

LABEL: 0x2BAF
STRING: Nenene

LABEL: 0x2BBF
STRING: Mihomi... Yes, that's right. Certainly, it wasn't a lie.

LABEL: 0x2C76
STRING: Nenene

LABEL: 0x2C86
STRING: Thank you, Mihomi. Thank you for letting me realize.

LABEL: 0x2D52
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0x2D62
STRING: Mhm! The last one is Big Sister Matsuri! Let's hear what you have to say!

LABEL: 0x2E4E
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x2E5E
STRING: Everyone has talked, so I suppose my turn would come eventually. Hmm, my story...

LABEL: 0x2EF8
STRING: Everyone's eyes were on me.

LABEL: 0x2F40
STRING: Blue, yellow, green, purple - they all looked at the Red Me.

LABEL: 0x2FA2
STRING: I quietly stared back at them.

LABEL: 0x3038
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x3048
STRING: Have you ever been forced into someone's image of you?

LABEL: 0x30F7
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x3107
STRING: I've been forced to put on an act for others for so long.

LABEL: 0x31AA
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x31BA
STRING: 'You're so cheerful', 'You're so kind'; in the end, no one can know your true self except you.

LABEL: 0x3237
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x3247
STRING: That is why I wanted to be broken. It was painful to live in that world.

LABEL: 0x330A
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x331A
STRING: I wanted to be broken by the person I love. That was my only wish.

LABEL: 0x33D1
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x33E1
STRING: And then I met him. Someone important, the one who broke me.

LABEL: 0x346F
STRING: All of our flowers bloomed.

LABEL: 0x34BD
STRING: Although in a different way, it was done by the same hands.

LABEL: 0x350F
STRING: Everyone remembers "him".

LABEL: 0x354E
STRING: However, none are allowed to say who it is.

LABEL: 0x35A7
STRING: I try not to mention "him".

LABEL: 0x35EF
STRING: I understand that the "him" they know is different from the "he" I know.

LABEL: 0x36AD
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x36BD
STRING: We are all the same. I wanted someone to understand the real me by destroying the image propped up by others.

LABEL: 0x376E
STRING: This is why we entrusted it to "him."

LABEL: 0x37B5
STRING: The seed of the flower called myself.

LABEL: 0x37EB
STRING: The rafflesia that bloomed have gathered in the same place like this.

LABEL: 0x3849
STRING: It must be a miracle.

LABEL: 0x38DB
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x38EB
STRING: In the future, children like us will appear. I am certain of it.

LABEL: 0x397B
STRING: This world is intensely cruel and unreasonable.

LABEL: 0x39CE
STRING: Violence and harsh language will hurt people.

LABEL: 0x3A2D
STRING: But by ignoring this, everyone lives.

LABEL: 0x3A72
STRING: Even so, we can only live here.

LABEL: 0x3AB9
STRING: You are only allowed to live here.

LABEL: 0x3B01
STRING: But due to this, children like these will appear again.

LABEL: 0x3BAD
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x3BBD
STRING: That is why we need to guide them. Give them a push in the right direction.

LABEL: 0x3C5D
STRING: Love, madness, and bizarre flowers will bloom again in the dream world.

LABEL: 0x3CB3
STRING: I don't know what color those flowers will be, or how they will bloom, but what we can do - is guide.

LABEL: 0x3D87
STRING: Mihomi

LABEL: 0x3D97
STRING: Can Mihomi be someone's older sister? Can I give someone a push? I hope I can!

LABEL: 0x3E8F
STRING: Ayume

LABEL: 0x3E9F
STRING: A stupid child like me will no doubt appear again. A child with anguish appearing as an ordinary person.

LABEL: 0x3F8F
STRING: Moeko

LABEL: 0x3F9F
STRING: I... think I can finally appreciate myself now. That's why I want to help a child like me who lacks confidence.

LABEL: 0x40AF
STRING: Nenene

LABEL: 0x40BF
STRING: What is your own happiness? There must be a child like me who is looking for it. I want to be the strength of that person.

LABEL: 0x417D
STRING: Everyone makes their own decisions.

LABEL: 0x420F
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x421F
STRING: I'm the same. I want to help a child who is like younger me! Their feelings shouldn't be denied.

LABEL: 0x42A9
STRING: These thoughts are surely not shared by many.

LABEL: 0x42F7
STRING: That's why we, on the same side, want to confirm our common goal.

LABEL: 0x4351
STRING: But it is not yet time.

LABEL: 0x4395
STRING: Fate is unclear. The moment when the die is thrown is still far away.

LABEL: 0x43E9
STRING: Therefore...

LABEL: 0x445C
STRING: Matsuri

LABEL: 0x446C
STRING: So... why don't we enjoy the tea party? I still want more! I want to listen to your stories more! I'll talk too!

LABEL: 0x452C
STRING: This dream must be like a miracle.

LABEL: 0x4572
STRING: The dreamy Rafflesias spent a short time together in this beautiful garden.
